name: jeez
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an expression of surprise or emotion: Jeez, don't yell at me - I'm just telling you what she said!
More examplesFewer examplesSo I took three steps toward him and said, "Jeez! Is there a problem?" I thought, well, jeez, she kind of looks like me.Geez! What's so complicated?You're wondering if they're over there saying, "Oh, geez, we ought to get rid of this guy and get somebody else in there."

Add to word list
used to express surprise, anger, or annoyance: Jeez, what took you so long?
